card_copy: Someone spills hot oil on you, you scream...
You arrive at the emergency room, they ask why you're here. You calmly say…
You meet your tinder match, they look at you and say…
You're waiting to hear about your newly born baby, the doctor comes out and says…
You ask siri where the nearest coffee shop is, she replies…
You ask your crush to be exclusive, they reply…
